snippet.title: Off The Grid – Official Teaser | Unreal Engine 5 Battle Royale
snippet.description:
Teardrop Island desperately needs a savior. Too bad it got you instead.

Off The Grid is a next-gen cyberpunk F2P battle royale – where 150 players fight on the gigantic map of Teardrop Island with exciting cyberlimbs and weapon customisations, and can experience a 60-hour narrative campaign solo or in up to 3-players teams. 

Coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S and PC (Epic) in 2024.

-----

Follow Off The Grid’s social media channels:
👉 Discord: https://discord.gg/offthegrid
👉 Website: https://playoffthegrid.com
👉 Twitter: https://twitter.com/playoffthegrid  
👉 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playoffthegrid/  
👉 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PlayOffTheGrid/  
👉 TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@playoffthegrid

#OffTheGrid #BattleRoyale #Cyberpunk #UnrealEngine5 #Gameplay #NeillBlomkamp
